'''"Humanity's Name" Unfettered''' is [[Mavuika]]'s [[Level 6 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This Constellation increases the time limits of climbing, traveling over water, and flying to 2s, 6s, and 6s, respectively.
